fields.name: reporting_period
fields.title: Reporting Period
fields.description: The current reporting period and fiscal year

fields.name: line_number
fields.title: Line Number
fields.description: The line number of the disclosure.

fields.name: province
fields.title: Province or Territory of Primary Residence
fields.description: The province or territory of the member’s main residence at the time the remuneration and/or expenses were incurred.

fields.name: role
fields.title: Role
fields.description: The member’s role at the time the remuneration and/or expenses were incurred (i.e. “C-P” is for chair and “M-M” is for member)

fields.name: meeting_hours
fields.title: Number of Hours Spent at Meeting(s)
fields.description: The number of hours when the member met with the committee in person or via teleconference during the reporting period.

fields.name: other_hours
fields.title: Number of hours spent on preparation, travel and/or training or orientation
fields.description: The number of hours the member spent on preparation, travel and/or training or orientation during the reporting period.

fields.name: remuneration
fields.title: Total Remuneration
fields.description: The total amount paid to the member for time spent at meetings, preparation, travel and/or training or orientation during the reporting period (i.e. per diem rate ÷ 7.5 hours x number of hours worked).

fields.name: travel_expenses
fields.title: Total Travel Expenses
fields.description: The total travel expenses incurred by the member during the reporting period, including transportation, meals, incidentals, etc.

fields.name: notes_en
fields.title: Notes (English)
fields.description: Any other relevant information (e.g. description of the activities included in the total remuneration, point of origin of a member’s travel, etc.)

fields.name: notes_fr
fields.title: Notes (French)
fields.description: Any other relevant information (e.g. description of the activities included in the total remuneration, point of origin of a member’s travel, etc.)
